desc: Improved product reliability and accessibility for over 1,000 users by resolving critical screen reader bugs, automating 30+ test cases for a Braille writer which enhanced usability, and developing cross-platform tests to ensure broad compatibility.

Accelerated bug resolution and system stability by leading the full-stack design, development, and prototyping of a scholarship management system, and actively managing the project workflow using Jira to ensure alignment with goals and deadlines.
